document.full_text: former nfl player r.w. mcquarters suffered non-life-threatening injuries when he was shot by a masked man in tulsa on saturday, police said.
document.title: cops: ex-nfl player r.w. mcquarters shot by masked man
lines_and_colors: former nfl player r.w. mcquarters suffered non-life-threatening injuries when he was shot by a masked man in tulsa on saturday, police said.
